# very simple webservice test

Execute `development-tools/docker/build-and-run.sh` and make sure it runs.

Execute `./start-listen.sh`.

In another terminal execute `./call-proxy.sh`.

**Sample:**

Terminal 1:

```plain

./start-listen.sh
GET / HTTP/1.0
Authorization:: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCIgOiAiSldUIiwia2lkIiA6ICJ1ZkZRZUNYbUdBWGcwQU5yV0NYRktwRmVyRHdOcE5JblhqaGZiZGR4NWlvIn0..eRCefR0W4iP9_n2KGda9JvNuu1roWa6MF-QhtuXpxro93kvQK3TzU6hFALcosSTbg8jcxPA4KmUyQFUvHzZS6Ks_BF0Xkj-ZTPuI6YnmSwLB-5g9vtBgymQuvS4nHpDutybiUaXSC8XpZ-tY13VeCwPpgJAOevN0C1CVdXUePUkOu-FnQRlVXMmxNK1a0v6HXTHQIMB9HLkVjmf6FlhjxLNwe9hicvERTyaoh4RDzDAgt9we3pZr_RTEs8_lwJGayms1rGquljOg3isLTDFcWqAFdpoqQeuXEydK3OwkeXiS2d7Clw_9X-VLRfTf33tUp8j3vDEVD_G4Q7rEbGknQg

```

Terminal 2:

```plain
./call-proxy.sh
```
